DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to specify if the patient received any growth factor agents just prior to study entry.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the administration of growth factors to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Substances made by the body that function to regulate cell division and cell survival. Some growth factors are also produced in the laboratory and used in biological therapy.

Concepts.definition: Growth Factors are extracellular signaling molecules (ligands) involved in control of target cell proliferation, cell survival, and cell differentiation. (NCI)
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient receive growth fa
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive growth factors within 1 week of entry onto this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior hematopoietic growth factor agents received

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive growth factors that support platelet or white cell number or function within 7 days prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive all colony forming growth factors for more than 1 week and all long acting growth factors for more than 2 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received colony-stimulating factors < 1 week prior to enrollment (GCSF, GM CSF, erythropoietin)? Two weeks must have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2, exclusion
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received colony-stimulating factors < 1 week prior to registration (GCSF, GM CSF, erythropoietin)?  Two weeks must have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive growth factors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been <=7 days since the last dose of growth factors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is off all colony-stimulating growth factor(s) for at least 1 week prior to enrollment (i.e. filgrastim, sargramostim), and at least two weeks have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is off all colony-stimulating growth factor(s) for at least 7 days prior to enrollment (i.e. filgrastim, sargramostim), and at least 14 days have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is off all colony forming growth factor(s) for at least one week prior to enrollment (i.e. filgrastim, sargramostim and erythropoietin), and at least two weeks have elapsed if patient received  long acting growth factors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been more than 7 days since the last dose of growth factor prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient off all colony-stimulating growth factor(s) for at least 1 week prior to enrollment (i.e. filgrastim, sargramostim or erythropoietin), and at least 2 weeks have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is off all colony-stimulating growth factor(s) for at least 7 days prior to enrollment (i.e. filgrastim, sargramostim or erythropoietin), and at least 14 days have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is off all colony-stimulating growth factor(s) for at least 7 days prior to enrollment (e.g. filgrastim, sargramostim or erythropoietin), and at least 14 days have elapsed if patients received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient off all colony-stimulating factor(s) (e.g. filgrastim, sargramostim or erythropoietin) for at least 1 week prior to enrollment, and at least 2 weeks have elapsed if patient received PEG formulations?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have prior hematopoietic growth factor agents been received?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient completed the baseline (T0) FDG-PET/CT prior to registration, did the patient use colony stimulating growth factors within 14 days prior to completing the T0 scan?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Prior Growth Factor Received Ind-2 [2196321v1.0] with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator   - dbw
